channel.title: Sony Music Entertainment on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Sony Music Entertainment on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jam Hsiao Signs Deal With Sony Music in Tri-Market Partnership
item.description: Mandopop heavyweight Jam Hsiao has inked a major deal with Sony Music Entertainment. The partnership represents a first for Sony Music, uniting its operations across Mainland China, Hong Kong, and Tai
